name: .PROCREATE
summary: Learn about .PROCREATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit a PROCREATE file with Savage Procreate and Procreate Pocket (iOS). Procreate is available for iPad, while Procreate Pocket is available for iPhone.
You can also open a PROCREATE file with Prospect, a Procreate viewer app for Mac. Prospect allows you to view and convert the image a PROCREATE file contains.
You can use Savage Procreate (iOS) to convert PROCREATE files to the following formats:
You can use Prospect (macOS) to convert PROCREATE files to the .PNG, .JPEG, .BMP, and .TIFF formats.
